channel.title: Can't open UDP port
channel.description:
I have an Actiontec GT704-WG router. I am pretty certain I have a dynamic IP. I use PFportchecker by portfoward.com to check if my ports are open or not. According to the website I should have both TCP and UDP open. I have my TCP open, but my UDP is not open.
PROBLEM SOLVED: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,419470.msg3083717.html#msg3083717
still got another problem though.
